Pre-Game Insights: Los Angeles Lakers are looking to continue their three-game road winning streak.
Houston Rockets are 14-8 against Western Conference opponents.
Houston Rockets are the worst team in the Western Conference shooting 32.5% from 3-point range.
Los Angeles Lakers are 16-7 against Western Conference opponents.
Los Angeles Lakers average 11.8 made 3-pointers per game this season, 0.5 fewer makes per game than the Rockets allow.
